content: अतिपत् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To pass over; neglect, omit, transgress. {@--2@} To fly by, beyond, or over; to cross {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} {@--1@} To delay, neglect; see अतिपात्य below. {@--2@} To disrespect, offend; ये सत्यमेव हि गुरूनतिपातयंति <ls>Mu. 3. 34</ls> transgress, violate; अतिपातितकालसाधना <ls>Ki. 2. 42.</ls> {@--3@} To cause to fly past or by. {@--4@} To make ineffectual; संशमनमेवं संशोधनमतिपातयति <ls>Suśr.</ls> {@--5@} To snatch away, drag away.
